name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, a Taiwanese netizen posted a video on Douyin saying, "Friends from the mainland, do you have any questions?" Netizens in the comment area offered their blessings one after another, "I really envy you, I wish you happiness" "I have cooperated with many Taiwanese clients, they are really super good clients" "My Taiwanese colleagues have left a good impression on me, I hope my Taiwanese compatriots are happy and healthy"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12 (Released) Lankao County, Henan. The man said that he worked at Xinhong Insulation Material Factory in 2018. On November 3, an explosion occurred during production at the factory, killing 8 people and disfiguring himself.
Afterwards, the county party committee promised to bear all expenses, but after the secretary was transferred, the government refused to treat him, and he was imprisoned by the police for three years.
After being released from prison, he asked the government to bear the medical expenses, but was still evaded by the leaders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to netizens who are familiar with the matter, the incident was caused by the female passenger mistakenly purchasing a train card for the 26-30 age group, rather than the 16-25 age group that was suitable for her. In fact, the former ticket is more expensive, and although according to regulations, she does need to pay for the ticket, the conductor usually does not ask for it. Some people believe that the conductor was deliberately making things difficult for her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, at the border of Huanggang and Wuhan, workers were dismantling the nucleic acid sampling point.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, someone graffitied in large letters at the entrance of Tianjin 1958 Hotel: "Down with the corrupt officials"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Full video: During a live broadcast, the female anchor of Jiyue Automobile was suddenly informed by colleagues that the company had gone bankrupt.
